Who said: Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory.
Deep into my soul, there's a light. The invisible light that no one knew, Till the day my body was dead. That light lit HIS way.
